location.name: Generated: The Main Engineering
location.description: The Main Engineering Bay of the Martian space station—filled with advanced technology, humming machinery, and massive viewports showing the red planet below.

characters.name: Dr. Mira Patel
characters.description: Short, with sharp features and dark hair pulled back into a bun. Wears a crisp blue engineering uniform.
characters.backstory: A talented robotics specialist and Alex's trusted colleague. Known for her quick thinking under pressure.

characters.name: Lt. Rhea Kim
characters.description: Athletic build, short-cropped black hair, and piercing hazel eyes. Wears a matte-black security uniform with a sidearm at her hip.
characters.backstory: Head of Security on the station. Known for her strict professionalism and sharp instincts, Rhea is respected and sometimes feared by the crew. Rumors suggest she was involved in a high-profile incident on Earth before her transfer.

description: The Main Engineering Bay buzzes with activity, the air thick with the scent of ozone and the low hum of fusion reactors. Alex Morgan stands by a sprawling holo-console, reviewing the station’s core systems, while Dr. Mira Patel hurriedly cross-references diagnostics on a secondary display. Suddenly, alarms blare—a crimson warning flashes across every screen: "Critical Power Fluctuation Detected in Sector 7." Lt. Rhea Kim, hand instinctively moving to her sidearm, scans the room for threats. Dr. Patel’s voice strains with urgency: "Alex, the reactor's output just spiked—we’re losing containment!" Outside the massive viewports, Mars turns a deeper shade of red as emergency shutters begin to close. The team must act fast to diagnose the cause, restore stability, and prevent a catastrophic failure—all while the source of the anomaly remains unknown.
